title: Design Architecture for Real-Time Data Processing
description: Create a high-level architecture design for the platform that can handle real-time data from millions of IoT devices.

title: Define Interface for IoT Devices Ingestion
description: Design and specify the interface to be used by IoT devices for data ingestion.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Data Processing

title: Implement Complex Event Processing Layer
description: Develop the layer responsible for processing complex events based on real-time data.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Data Processing

title: Create Web Interface for Monitoring and Management
description: Develop a user interface for monitoring the platform's performance, managing devices, and configuring rules.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Data Processing

title: Implement Automated Action Support
description: Add support for automated actions based on real-time data processing and event triggering.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Data Processing

title: Set Up Database Schema and Storage Strategy
description: Define the database schema and storage strategy to support efficient data processing and retrieval.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Data Processing

title: Perform DevOps Configuration and Setup
description: Configure the platform to follow best practices in DevOps, including continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) and infrastructure as code (IaC).
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Data Processing

title: Perform Security Audit and Risk Assessment
description: Evaluate the security risks associated with the platform and propose countermeasures to mitigate them.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Data Processing

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create user documentation detailing the usage of the platform, including setup, configuration, and troubleshooting.
dependencies: Design Architecture for Real-Time Data Processing
